players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Since Alice was found dead last night, we lost a player without any information yet. Charlie has been silent so far, which feels odd on Day 1. Charlie, can you share your thoughts or observations to help us figure out who might be mafia?"

Diana: "Bob has also been silent like Charlie, which makes it hard for us to gather clues. We need someone to speak up or we risk losing more ground. Bob, do you have any suspicions or insights to share?"
You: "Charlie, I agree that silence isn’t helpful. I think we should focus on gathering concrete info before pointing fingers. Diana, what made you suspicious of me and Charlie specifically?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
